Imports

spec, version, group

Types

DistMethod = enum
  Local = "local", Git = "git", Nest = "nest", Merc = "hg"
Package = ref object
  name*: string
  url*: Uri
  dist*: DistMethod
  tags*: seq[string]
  description*: string
  license*: string
  web*: Uri
  naive*: bool
  local*: bool
  path*: string
  author*: string

PackageGroup = Group[string, Package]
PackagesResult = object
  ok*: bool
  why*: string
  packages*: PackageGroup
  info: FileInfo
